content.question: The ideas expressed in the excerpt are most closely aligned with which of the following broader historical developments?

choices.label: The emergence of the sexual revolution
The growth of the modern conservative movement
The increased use of federal power to address social inequalities
The critique of postâ€“Second World War liberalism from groups on the left

content.answer: The growth of the modern conservative movement

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
